attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
United Kingdoms population is just above 60ml and has 630 Members of Parliament, it  is grossly overrepresented.
Some countries with fivefold population have less representatives them we have. We urge the government to take steps to reduce the size of The House by 150 members

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
